text.en: Master over the treasury of fearless debate, exposition and composition,
text.en-trans: jikmé tsö ché tsompé ter la wang

text.en: With all the qualities of the three trainings perfectly complete,
text.en-trans: puntsok labpa sum gyi yönten dzok

text.en: Precious source of benefit and happiness beyond measure,
Supreme guide, glorious lama, to you I pray!1
text.en-trans: dren chok palden lamar solwa dep
